lingos.title: Afterburner
lingos.description: Afterburners are the less popular speed boosting option, offering a 200% speed boost but without penalties. Contrast with MWDs.

lingos.title: ABC Ores
lingos.description: Arkanor, Bistot, and Crokite, respectively. These three ores are the most valuable of the standard ore types. This term is often used to when discussing the economics of mining in null-sec.

lingos.title: Autocannons
lingos.description: Autocannons are one of two kinds of projectile turrets, being intended for closer rather than longer range. See 'Arties.'
